title: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: spaghetti, eggs, pancetta, parmesan cheese, black pepper
directions: Cook spaghetti. Fry pancetta. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine all ingredients.

title: Chicken Curry

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
ingredients: broccoli, bell peppers, carrots, soy sauce, garlic
directions: Stir fry vegetables. Add soy sauce and garlic. Cook until tender.
